00026 \********************************************************************/
00027 
00028 #include "midas.h"
00029 #include <stdio.h>
00030 
00031 /* user RPC ID's must start after RPC_MIN_ID */
00032 #define RPC_MYTEST RPC_MIN_ID
00033 
00034 /* define MYTEST function with some parameters, 
00035    must match definition on server */
00036 RPC_LIST rpc_list[] = {
00037 
00038    {RPC_MYTEST, "rpc_mytest",
00039     {{TID_BYTE, RPC_IN}
00040      ,
00041      {TID_WORD, RPC_IN}
00042      ,
00043      {TID_INT, RPC_IN}
00044      ,
00045      {TID_FLOAT, RPC_IN}
00046      ,
00047      {TID_DOUBLE, RPC_IN}
00048      ,
00049      {TID_BYTE, RPC_OUT}
00050      ,
00051      {TID_WORD, RPC_OUT}
00052      ,
00053      {TID_INT, RPC_OUT}
00054      ,
00055      {TID_FLOAT, RPC_OUT}
00056      ,
00057      {TID_DOUBLE, RPC_OUT}
00058      ,
00059      {0}
00060      }
00061     }
00062    ,
00063 
00064    {0}
00065 
00066 };
00067 
00068 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00069 
00070 main()
00071 {
00072    char host_name[80];
00073    HNDLE hConn;
00074    INT status;
00075    BYTE b;
00076    WORD w;
00077    INT i;
00078    float f;
00079    double d;
00080 
00081    printf("Remote host name: ");
00082    ss_gets(host_name, sizeof(host_name));
00083 
00084    /* register this as an RPC client with rpc_list */
00085    rpc_register_client("MYCLIENT", rpc_list);
00086 
00087    /* connect to RPC server */
00088    status = rpc_client_connect(host_name, 1750, "", &hConn);
00089    if (status != RPC_SUCCESS) {
00090       printf("Cannot connect to RPC server running on %s at port 1750.\n", host_name);
00091       return 0;
00092    }
00093 
00094    f = 3.5f;
00095    d = 4.5;
00096 
00097    /* rpc_mytest just doubles numbers */
00098    rpc_client_call(hConn, RPC_MYTEST, 1, 2, 3l, f, d, &b, &w, &i, &f, &d);
00099 
00100    printf("\nResult should be:  2 4 6 7.0 9.0\n");
00101    printf("Result is:         %d %d %ld %1.1f %1.1lf\n", b, w, i, f, d);
00102 
00103    printf("\nhit return...");
00104    b = getchar();
00105 
00106    /* disconnect this client from server */
00107    rpc_client_disconnect(hConn, FALSE);
00108    return 1;
00109 }
